Class Cinema

java.lang.Object
Cinema
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Cinema extends Object implements Serializable
This class contains all the information of a cinema
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    Cinema(int cinemaCode, CinemaClass cinemaClass, int numRow, int numRowCouple, int maxSeatPerRow, String cineplexName)
    Creates a Cinema object for the given cinema code, cinema class, number of row, number of couple row, maximum seat per row and the cineplex name that the cinema belongs to

  • Constructor Details

    • Cinema

      public Cinema(int cinemaCode, CinemaClass cinemaClass, int numRow, int numRowCouple, int maxSeatPerRow, String cineplexName)
      Creates a Cinema object for the given cinema code, cinema class, number of row, number of couple row, maximum seat per row and the cineplex name that the cinema belongs to
      Parameters:
      cinemaCode - the code of the cinema
      cinemaClass - the cinema class of the cinema
      numRow - the number of row of the cinema
      numRowCouple - the number of couple row of the cinema
      maxSeatPerRow - the maximum seat per row of the cinema
      cineplexName - the cineplex name that the cinema belongs to

      public void addShowTime(ShowTime showTime)

      Parameters:

    • checkClash

      public boolean checkClash(ShowTime newShowTime, ShowTime currentShowTime)
      This method checks whether there is a clash for the new showtime and the existing show times in the cinema
      Parameters:
      newShowTime - the new show time
      currentShowTime - the current show time
      Returns:
      if there's a clash, it will return true, otherwise it returns false
